long_description: This Energizer Advanced Lithium 9V battery lets you power up your high-tech gadgets and enjoy photos, tunes and games on the go. Leak-resistant, lithium performance offers long-lasting power and a shelf life of up to 10 years. The Energizer Advanced Lithium 9V battery weighs 25% less than a standard alkaline 9V battery.
short_description: This Energizer Advanced Lithium 9V battery lets you power up your high-tech gadgets and enjoy photos, tunes and games on the go.
